<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hand of the Apprentice](/Feats.aspx?ID=636) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 209 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[universalist wizard](/ArcaneSchools.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe. You gain the [_hand of the apprentice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=530) universalist spell. Universalist spells are a type of focus spell, much like school spells. You start with a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. See [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276) for more information about focus spells.

<title level="2">Hand of the Apprentice leads to...</title>
[Universal Versatility](/Feats.aspx?ID=649)
name: Hand of the Apprentice
